Once a threat to the Galactic Colonies Bureau, the humanity has now been reduced to just a thousand living on a nearby earth-like planet.

It's the year 13345 by the Earth Calendar.


Join Mr. Ibrahim on his quest to rescue his kidnaped son aboard his Model-PXFS Agalotl.

Personajes

Mr. Ibrahim
Agalotl
Sra. de Ibrahim
P-Bill (es un Cerdo Espacial)
Yazpik (es un Jaguar Espacial)

Escenas

Jovl'ek (bosque)
Ts'oon'ek (Cañón)
Kaajal'ek (Ciudad con ballena)
Chajal'ek (Infierno/Último Nivel)
